nodes.name: Webhook Trigger
nodes.notes:
üîß CLIENT SETUP REQUIRED:
- This webhook receives order status updates from your Android app
- Update the webhook URL in your CartViewModel.kt
- Ensure your app sends: orderId, orderStatus, customerEmail, customerName, orderTotal, orderItems
- Test with Postman before connecting to your app

üìù EXPECTED DATA FORMAT:
{
  "orderId": "ORDER_12345678",
  "orderStatus": "CONFIRMED",
  "customerEmail": "customer@example.com",
  "customerName": "John Doe",
  "orderTotal": 45.99,
  "orderItems": [{"productName": "Paracetamol", "quantity": 2, "price": 5.99}]
}

nodes.name: Data Validation
nodes.notes:
üîß CLIENT SETUP REQUIRED:
- This node validates that required fields are present
- Modify validation conditions based on your data structure
- Add additional validation rules if needed (email format, status values)
- Update error handling for invalid data

üìù VALIDATION RULES:
- orderId must exist and not be empty
- orderStatus must be one of: CONFIRMED, PAYMENT_RECEIVED, PROCESSING, SHIPPED, DELIVERED, CANCELLED
- customerEmail must be a valid email format
- Add more validation as needed for your business rules

nodes.name: Order Status Router
nodes.notes:
üîß CLIENT SETUP REQUIRED:
- This node routes to different email templates based on order status
- Update order status values to match your app's status values exactly
- Add/remove routes if you have different statuses
- Ensure status values are case-sensitive and match exactly

üìù ROUTE CONFIGURATION:
Output 0: CONFIRMED
Output 1: PAYMENT_RECEIVED
Output 2: PROCESSING
Output 3: SHIPPED
Output 4: DELIVERED
Output 5: CANCELLED

‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: Status values must match exactly what your Android app sends

parameters.subject: Order Confirmed - Rite Medical #{{ $json.orderId }}
parameters.message:
Order Confirmed!

Dear {{ $json.customerName }},

Great news! Your order #{{ $json.orderId }} has been confirmed and we're preparing it for you.

Order Details:

Order ID: {{ $json.orderId }}

Total Amount: ${{ $json.orderTotal }}

Status: Confirmed

Order Date: {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString() }}

We'll notify you as soon as your payment is received and your order moves to the next stage.

Thank you for choosing Rite Medical!

Best regards,
Rite Medical Team

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

For support, contact us at support@yourmedicalapp.com

nodes.name: CONFIRMED Email
nodes.notes:
üîß CLIENT SETUP REQUIRED:
- Configure Gmail OAuth2 credentials (see setup guide)
- Replace 'notifications@yourmedicalapp.com' with your actual notification email
- Customize email template with your brand colors and messaging
- Update support email address
- Add your company logo to the email template
- Test email delivery and formatting

üìù GMAIL SETUP STEPS:
1. Go to Google Cloud Console
2. Enable Gmail API
3. Create OAuth2 credentials
4. Add credentials to this node
5. Test with a sample email

‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: Use a dedicated email account for notifications

parameters.subject: Payment Received - Order #{{ $json.orderId }}
parameters.message:
Payment Received!

Dear {{ $json.customerName }},

We've received your payment for order #{{ $json.orderId }} and your order is now being processed.

Payment Confirmation:

Order ID: {{ $json.orderId }}

Amount Paid: ${{ $json.orderTotal }}

Payment Status: Received

Payment Date: {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString() }}

Your order will now move to processing and we'll keep you updated on its progress.

Thank you for your payment!

Best regards,
Rite Medical Team

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

For support, contact us at support@yourmedicalapp.com

nodes.name: PAYMENT_RECEIVED Email
nodes.notes:
üîß CLIENT SETUP REQUIRED:
- Same Gmail credentials as other email nodes
- Customize payment confirmation message
- Update payment processing timeline
- Add any specific payment method details
- Include order tracking information if available

üìù EMAIL CONTENT NOTES:
- Confirms payment receipt
- Provides order processing timeline
- Includes payment details
- Sets expectations for next steps

parameters.subject: Order Processing - #{{ $json.orderId }}
parameters.message:
Order Processing

Dear {{ $json.customerName }},

Your order #{{ $json.orderId }} is now being processed and prepared for delivery.

Processing Details:

Order ID: {{ $json.orderId }}

Status: Processing

Estimated Delivery: 25-30 minutes

Processing Started: {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString() }}

Our team is carefully preparing your order to ensure everything is correct and properly packaged.

You'll receive another notification when your order is shipped and on its way to you.

Best regards,
Rite Medical Team

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

For support, contact us at support@yourmedicalapp.com

nodes.name: PROCESSING Email
nodes.notes:
üîß CLIENT SETUP REQUIRED:
- Update estimated delivery time based on your service area
- Customize processing message for your business
- Add any specific processing steps or quality checks
- Include delivery area information
- Update timeline expectations

üìù DELIVERY TIMELINE:
- Adjust 25-30 minutes based on your actual delivery times
- Consider different timeframes for different areas
- Include any special handling instructions

parameters.subject: Order Shipped - #{{ $json.orderId }}
parameters.message:
Order Shipped!

Dear {{ $json.customerName }},

Great news! Your order #{{ $json.orderId }} has been shipped and is on its way to you.

Shipping Details:

Order ID: {{ $json.orderId }}

Status: Shipped

Estimated Delivery: Within 10-15 minutes

Shipped Date: {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString() }}

Delivery Address: [Customer's delivery address]

Your order is being delivered by our trusted delivery partner and should arrive shortly.

Please ensure someone is available to receive the delivery.

Best regards,
Rite Medical Team

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

For support, contact us at support@yourmedicalapp.com

nodes.name: SHIPPED Email
nodes.notes:
üîß CLIENT SETUP REQUIRED:
- Update delivery address field to pull from your data
- Adjust estimated delivery time based on your service
- Add delivery partner information if applicable
- Include any delivery instructions or requirements
- Add tracking information if available
- Update delivery expectations

üìù DELIVERY SETUP:
- Configure delivery address mapping
- Set appropriate delivery timeframes
- Add delivery partner branding
- Include any special delivery instructions

parameters.subject: Order Delivered - #{{ $json.orderId }}
parameters.message:
Order Delivered!

Dear {{ $json.customerName }},

Your order #{{ $json.orderId }} has been successfully delivered!

Delivery Confirmation:

Order ID: {{ $json.orderId }}

Status: Delivered

Delivery Date: {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString() }}

Delivery Time: {{ new Date().toLocaleTimeString() }}

Thank you for choosing Rite Medical! We hope you're satisfied with your order.

If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us.

We look forward to serving you again!

Best regards,
Rite Medical Team

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

For support, contact us at support@yourmedicalapp.com

nodes.name: DELIVERED Email
nodes.notes:
üîß CLIENT SETUP REQUIRED:
- Customize delivery confirmation message
- Add feedback request or review invitation
- Include reorder information
- Add customer satisfaction survey link
- Update support contact information
- Include loyalty program information if applicable

üìù POST-DELIVERY ENGAGEMENT:
- Consider adding review request
- Include reorder incentives
- Add customer feedback form
- Promote loyalty program

parameters.subject: Order Cancelled - #{{ $json.orderId }}
parameters.message:
Order Cancelled

Dear {{ $json.customerName }},

Your order #{{ $json.orderId }} has been cancelled.

Cancellation Details:

Order ID: {{ $json.orderId }}

Status: Cancelled

Cancellation Date: {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString() }}

Order Amount: ${{ $json.orderTotal }}

If you made a payment, it will be refunded according to our refund policy.

If you have any questions about this cancellation, please contact our support team.

We hope to serve you again in the future.

Best regards,
Rite Medical Team

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this email.

For support, contact us at support@yourmedicalapp.com

nodes.name: CANCELLED Email
nodes.notes:
üîß CLIENT SETUP REQUIRED:
- Update refund policy information
- Add specific cancellation reasons if available
- Include reorder incentives
- Update support contact for cancellation issues
- Add any specific cancellation procedures
- Include customer retention messaging

üìù CANCELLATION HANDLING:
- Clarify refund timeline
- Add reorder incentives
- Provide support contact
- Include retention messaging

parameters.responseBody:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Order notification processed successfully",
  "orderId": "{{ $json.orderId }}",
  "status": "{{ $json.orderStatus }}",
  "timestamp": "{{ new Date().toISOString() }}"
}

nodes.name: Webhook Response
nodes.notes:
üîß CLIENT SETUP REQUIRED:
- This node sends a response back to your Android app
- Update response format if your app expects different data
- Add any additional response fields needed
- Include error handling for failed notifications
- Add logging for debugging purposes

üìù RESPONSE FORMAT:
- Confirms notification was processed
- Returns order details for verification
- Includes timestamp for tracking
- Can be used for app-side error handling
